alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 1:54PM MST until February 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Pueblo County. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An extended period of cold and snow is expected. Very low wind chills are expected tonight and again Wednesday night. Light to moderate snow, with periods of heavy snow, will likely impact the morning and evening commutes today through Thursday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
